transcript.title: Doorstop Interview Old Parliament House, Canberra
transcript.content:
JOURNALIST:

I don't have all the details, but I understand that the good news is that Harry Kewell....

PRIME MINISTER:

The good news is that Harry Kewell is going to be able to play and that is fantastic and I think it would have been a terrible shame otherwise. I mean, if we're going to win this, we ought to win it with all our top blokes available. If we're not, well it's better that we don't with all our top blokes available. And I think it's a great outcome and another late night.

[ends]
